text: ` ` Game of Thrones'' and ` ` Wonder Woman'' ruled Twitter in 2017. Twitter released its year - end data, and the HBO drama once again topped the list of most - tweeted television shows. Netflix was a big winner, too, with its supernatural drama ` ` Stranger Things'' landing at No. 2 overall and other originals like ` ` 13 Reasons Why,'' ` ` Orange Is the New Black,'' and ` ` House of Cards'' dominating the streaming - only list. In the movie category, the superhero blockbuster ` ` Wonder Woman'' lassoed the honors. ` ` La La Land'' took second place, possibly after the mix - up that briefly awarded it the Oscar for Best Film ( which was actually won by ` ` Moonlight
